p: Cassia senna L. (synonym Casia angustifolia Vahl.) is a perennial herb up to 90 cm tall with compound leaves. Inflorescence terminal or auxillary receme. Flower pedicilate .It is an important traditional medicinal plant. It is distributed in hot and dry region of Africa and Asia including Pakistan, India, Algeria, Egypt, Sudan, Somalea, and Arabia ( Nasir and Ali, 2001, 1972–94).
